member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to automatically follow redirection responses.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.HttpClient.SocketHandling.SocketsHttpHandlerOptions.AutomaticDecompression
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of decompression method used by the handler for automatic decompression of the HTTP content response.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.HttpClient.SocketHandling.SocketsHttpHandlerOptions.ConnectTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to the server before terminating the attempt and generating an error.
member.returns: The default value is 10 seconds. 100 minutes is the max timeout value in Azure SLB.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.HttpClient.SocketHandling.SocketsHttpHandlerOptions.KeepAlivePingDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets the keep alive ping delay.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.HttpClient.SocketHandling.SocketsHttpHandlerOptions.KeepAlivePingTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the keep alive ping timeout.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.HttpClient.SocketHandling.SocketsHttpHandlerOptions.MaxConnectionsPerServer
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of concurrent connections (per server endpoint) allowed when making requests.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.HttpClient.SocketHandling.SocketsHttpHandlerOptions.PooledConnectionIdleTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets how long a connection can be idle in the pool to be considered reusable.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.HttpClient.SocketHandling.SocketsHttpHandlerOptions.PooledConnectionLifetime
member.summary: Gets or sets how long a connection can be in the pool to be considered reusable.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.HttpClient.SocketHandling.SocketsHttpHandlerOptions.UseCookies
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use cookies when sending requests.
